item.title: Collectrate Vs CMC Cricket Match
item.dc:creator: Vinay Oommen
item.description:
Watch the Collector of Vellore, staff and students of CMC in action. All are invited. 6:00 pm at the Bagayam Oval Ground on Saturday 15th April

The post Collectrate Vs CMC Cricket Match appeared first on Campus Events.
